description: Type of rollover. Action Commit means run real rollover

javaEnums.name: PREVIEW
javaEnums.title: Preview
javaEnums.description: Run only budget and encumbrance rollover. Result will be not saved in real tables.

javaEnums.name: COMMIT
javaEnums.title: Commit
javaEnums.description: Run real for budgets, encumbrances and orders rollover. Result will be saved in real tables.

javaEnums.name: ROLLBACK
javaEnums.title: Rollback
javaEnums.description: Rollback budgets, encumbrances and orders rollover.
